page.title: 04EASTRIGGS POPULATION
page.content: There are about 640 men and 690 women in Eastriggs and about 30 men and 20 women elsewhere in the block. There are about 50_60 young people between the ages of 16 and 18 in Eastriggs, and 4 elsewhere. About 100 Eastriggs children are at secondary school, and 4 from the rest of the block. About 150 Eastriggs children are at primary school, and 4 from the rest of the block. There are about 130 Eastriggs children below primary school age and, say, 3 from the rest of the block. The population of Eastriggs village is about 1765, and about 65 people live in farms, small_holdings and cottages elsewhere in the block, making the total population of the block about 1830.
